sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Apple has lost about 6.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express ( AXP ), trading down 1.5%.
American Express is lower by about 9.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.2%, and Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading up 0.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
